sentence: Roman and Brown, according to Thompsons letters, were aware of, and participated in, efforts to promote unsupported allegations of fraud? and encouraged state legislators to alter the outcome of the November 2020 election by, among other things, appointing alternate slates of electors to send competing electoral votes to the United States Congress.? Among the state officials subpoenaed were a prominent legislator from Pennsylvania, state Sen. Douglas Mastriano (R), who has long advocated an audit of the 2020 results and was praised by Trump for his efforts.
title: Jan 6 panel issues six new subpoenas

sentence: Pennsylvania State Sen. Douglas Mastriano was subpoenaed as the committee said he was part of a plan to arrange for alternate electors from Pennsylvania and "reportedly spoke with President Trump about post-election activities."
author: Daniel Uria
title: Jan. 6 committee issues subpoenas seeking information on alternate elector plots
